title: Task 44

question.text: What does the expert mean when saying hitting the snooze button disrupts your sleep cycle?

answers.feedback: To disrupt implies interference, not necessarily lengthening the sleep cycle.

answers.answer: It interrupts the natural pattern of your sleep

answers.feedback: Disrupts indicates a negative impact, not an improvement in sleep quality.

answers.answer: It has no effect on the sleep cycle
answers.feedback: Disrupts specifically implies that there is an impact or interference with the sleep cycle.

description:
To disrupt is a verb that means to interrupt or prevent something from continuing in its usual way. For example: Loud noises disrupt my concentration (interrupts the concentration)

The term sleep cycle refers to the natural pattern of sleep, including different stages the body goes through while sleeping. For example:

A good sleep cycle is vital for restful sleep (refers to a healthy pattern of sleep)
